Two users unknowingly used RSA keys with a shared prime. They both encrypted messages; intercept the ciphertext 3164401698465130616841265860085746823397138881670398416639123692696917568325345451631394943310921216962158291983193233753097894725533871922908099448668828 and exploit this to recover the secret message.

The flag format is flag{...}
n=4184332289678119071932338625332298721877457298300598785946628148063771001215361183732120114478463578050147508590577780302972761326571211497927901405912397, n2=6360616368816375845971406870262964348265306014908920320873254617068877998528970308223990632417581375842067355818420780983743259184089725321320551110515871, e=533538367059831937666188466700119096025611173534673138042599708607163205208514192510759283239356999866776920290430601524360018004609940279981838321740899

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{fksipzrk}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 3164401698465130616841265860085746823397138881670398416639123692696917568325345451631394943310921216962158291983193233753097894725533871922908099448668828
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=4184332289678119071932338625332298721877457298300598785946628148063771001215361183732120114478463578050147508590577780302972761326571211497927901405912397, n2=6360616368816375845971406870262964348265306014908920320873254617068877998528970308223990632417581375842067355818420780983743259184089725321320551110515871, e=533538367059831937666188466700119096025611173534673138042599708607163205208514192510759283239356999866776920290430601524360018004609940279981838321740899
extra_info: p=63442248212436781651478062113364166049601642190968449250130643437259812042023, q=65954981224291660137266195010942875185266134384121518184816735923689363794539, q2=100258369588634540140151758922930378137205598555699762743003365138338178168777, φ(n)=4184332289678119071932338625332298721877457298300598785946628148063771001215231786502683386036674833793023201549342912526397671359136264118566952230075836, φ(n2)=6360616368816375845971406870262964348265306014908920320873254617068877998528806607606189561095789746021031061274233973742996590972096591312744953120305072
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
